snacks.name: Pumpkin Spice Popcorn
snacks.description: Sweet and salty popcorn infused with the classic fall flavors of pumpkin spice.

snacks.name: Witch's Finger Pretzel Rods
snacks.description: Creepy but delightful, these pretzel rods are dipped in green chocolate and adorned with an almond fingernail.

snacks.name: Haunted House Pizza Bites
snacks.description: Bite-sized pizzas shaped like haunted houses, topped with mozzarella ghosts.

snacks.name: Black Cat Oreos
snacks.description: Oreos cleverly decorated to look like spooky black cats.

snacks.name: Monster Mallows
snacks.description: Marshmallows transformed into monsters using colorful icing and creative toppings.

snacks.name: Apple Caramel Chews
snacks.description: Juicy apple chews coated in rich, buttery caramel.

snacks.name: Ghostly Gummies
snacks.description: Gummy candies in the shape of ghosts, perfect for the Halloween season.

snacks.name: Spider Web Donuts
snacks.description: Delicious donuts topped with a spiderweb design, perfect with a cup of hot cider.

snacks.name: Ghoulish Granola Bars
snacks.description: Nutritious granola bars with scary face designs.

snacks.name: Monster Eyeball Macaroons
snacks.description: French macaroons decorated to look like colourful monster eyes.

snacks.name: Spooky S’mores Dip
snacks.description: A fun twist on the classic s'mores, served dip-style with graham crackers on the side.

snacks.name: Candy Corn Popsicles
snacks.description: Layered popsicles replicating the iconic colors of candy corn.

snacks.name: Creepy Critter Crispy Treats
snacks.description: Rice crispy bars formed into spooky shapes and adorned with candy.

snacks.name: Mummy Muffins
snacks.description: Baked orange-cream muffins cleverly decorated to resemble mummies.

snacks.name: Pumpkin Patch Parfaits
snacks.description: Parfaits layered with pumpkin puree, greek yogurt and granola.

snacks.name: Zombie Zucchini Boats
snacks.description: Zucchini boats filled with tasty filling, decorated as cute but scary zombies.

snacks.name: Batty Chocolate Bark
snacks.description: Rich dark chocolate bark decorated with candy bats and Halloween sprinkles.

snacks.name: Werewolf Wontons
snacks.description: Crispy wontons filled with sweet pumpkin cream.

snacks.name: Frankenstein Fruit Cups
snacks.description: Healthy fruit cups decorated to resemble Frankenstein's monster.

snacks.name: Eerie Eyeball Eggs
snacks.description: Hard-boiled eggs decorated to look like spooky eyeballs.

snacks.name: Skeleton Skewers
snacks.description: Fruit skewers assembled to look like mini skeletons.

snacks.name: Scary Skull Sugar Cookies
snacks.description: Delicious sugar cookies shaped like skulls and decorated with icing.

snacks.name: Vampire Velvet cupcakes
snacks.description: Red velvet cupcakes with cream cheese frosting, decorated like vampires.

snacks.name: Boo! Berry Parfait
snacks.description: A layered dessert with blueberries, granola, and creamy yogurt.

snacks.name: Gruesome Grape Gummies
snacks.description: Homemade grape-flavored gummy candies.

snacks.name: Executioner’s Eclairs
snacks.description: Choux pastry eclairs, filled with creamy custard.

snacks.name: Bloodshot Peanut Butter Balls
snacks.description: Peanut butter balls with a red jam center, designed to look like bloodshot eyes.

snacks.name: Dracula's Dentures
snacks.description: A fun cookie treat that looks like Dracula's dentures, made from red frosting and marshmallows.

snacks.name: Goblin’s Gooey Caramel Apples
snacks.description: Tart apples coated in rich caramel, perfect for a Halloween treat.

snacks.name: Jack-o-lantern Jellies
snacks.description: Orange jellies moulded to look like jack-o-lanterns.

snacks.name: Fall Leaves Fudge
snacks.description: Sweet chocolate fudge decorated with colorful fall leaf sprinkles.
